tables.title: Frontier Outskirts
tables.description: Moments on the edge of a young colony struggling to thrive.

entries.result: Terraforming towers vent steam, cloaking a group of saboteurs.
A rover limps back with cracked solar panels and no crew inside.
Survey drones map an unmarked ruin now emitting power readings.
Colonists argue over water rations as a supply ship reports delays.
A dust storm reveals buried cargo pods with military stencils.
A local guide begs for help retrieving family stuck in a sinkhole.
A herd of bio-engineered livestock stampedes after a sonic boom.
An outpost beacon transmits coordinates that don't match any map.
Miners return early, claiming they saw reflections moving in solid rock.
An orbital shuttle makes an emergency landing trailing black smoke.
A prospector offers a strange crystal that hums near powered gear.
A security officer requests backup; sensors show something massive approaching.

tables.title: Colony Mysteries
tables.description: Hooks for scientific intrigue, alien ruins, or political sabotage.

entries.result: A scientist vanishes after claiming to decode alien lattice patterns.
Power cores drain overnight only in habitats facing the sunrise.
An agricultural AI starts rerouting drones to build something in the canyons.
A delegate from orbit pressures the governor to hide an impact crater.
Geophones record rhythmic tremors that line up with starship departures.
A metallic monolith appears outside the perimeter fence, perfectly smooth.
Encrypted messages broadcast from deep desert coordinates no one claimed.
An old Earth relic is found intact, broadcasting an outdated distress call.

tables.title: Environmental Hazards
tables.description: Complications that make frontier missions tense and costly.

entries.result: Dust devils infused with static discharge short out exposed electronics.
A solar flare forces everyone indoors; exterior drones go offline.
Localized gravity glitches in an uncharted valley disorient vehicles.
A fungal bloom releases spores that corrode metal surfaces.
Magnetic storms distort compasses and ping unexploded munitions.
An ice pocket collapses, revealing sub-surface tunnels flooding with meltwater.
